title: Star Guardian Lux
body: Is it just me or does it seem harder to aim Lux ult if this skin is used? When I use steel legion lux I have no issues but it seems like with Star Guardian Lux the width is smaller or it aims slightly to the side of your cursor. It's consistently off so I figure it must be something technical cos I simply don't have the issue with Steel legion. I dont get it. It doesnt make sense...
